messages.messageBody:
-=-I have some parenting questions related to the 16yod, but hesitate
to ask them here since she is no longer unschooled. I love the
perspectives on parenting that I've gained from this list.=-

Since the list isn't very busy, go ahead and ask if you want to. I
don't know of such a list (former unschoolers discussing kids now in
school).

Sandra

messages.subject: Parenting List?
messages.msgSnippet: Is there a list for parents whose unschooled children decided to go to school? My 16yod decided to attend high school and is pretty happy there. (Maybe in part
messages.messageBody:
Is there a list for parents whose unschooled children decided to go to school?

My 16yod decided to attend high school and is pretty happy there. (Maybe in part because she knows she can come home at anytime.) My 13yod is still unschooling.

I have some parenting questions related to the 16yod, but hesitate to ask them here since she is no longer unschooled. I love the perspectives on parenting that I've gained from this list.

Mary Ellen

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
